modName: PhotoMontage - An ENB and FXAA configuration
summary: A complete configuration for ENBSeries and FXAA Post Process Injector aimed at providing a realistic feel for the game as well as high quality visuals.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Note: This is my first try at editing ENB and FXAA configs and my first attempt at modding altogether. Please understand that this is a work in progress. If you want to contribute, send your feedback and state what you want to change in the next version.[/b]

[b]About this mod[/b]
A complete configuration for ENBSeries and FXAA Post Process Injector aimed at providing good looking game with 747823 and Pluto\'s [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4323]Realistic Lighting Without Post-Processing[/url].

[b]Recommended mods[/b]
This configuration has been tweaked to offer the best results when used with 747823 and Pluto\'s [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4323]Realistic Lighting Without Post-Processing[/url].
As such, it is recommended that you use it to enjoy the full effect of this mod.

[b]Incompatibility[/b]
It should be compatible with everything. Except other ENB and FXAA configs, obviously...

[b]Versions[/b]
-0.2a :
+ Colors are more like the regular game
+ More saturation
+ Nicer looking SSAO (It doesn\'t flicker in the distance anymore.)
+ Darker nights (When combined with Realistic Lightning Without Post Processing. You\'ll actually have to use a torch ! 
-0.1a : Initial release

[b]Known bugs[/b]
- Hands look way too bright in first person during the night. Third person view looks fine, though, as does everything else. I don\'t know where this comes from...)
- Water looks good during the night for about 2-3 meters. Then it looks like shit. (Same problem as the hands...)
author: MrTimscampi
